mapper.select: SELECT DISCT_NO,EVENT_NO, MARKET_NAME, EVENT_NAME, REGST_DATE, START_DATE,END_DATE, HIT_NUM, LIKE_CNT, BEST_STD,RNUM FROM (SELECT DISCT_NO,EVENT_NO, MARKET_NAME, EVENT_NAME, REGST_DATE, START_DATE,END_DATE, HIT_NUM, LIKE_CNT, BEST_STD, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BEST_STD DESC,HIT_NUM DESC) AS RNUM FROM (SELECT D.DISCT_NO,E.EVENT_NO, M.MARKET_NAME,E.EVENT_NAME,TO_CHAR(E.REGST_DATE,'YY-MM-DD') AS REGST_DATE, TO_CHAR(E.START_DATE,'YY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE,TO_CHAR(E.END_DATE,'YY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE, E.HIT_NUM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EVENT_LIKE EL WHERE EL.EVENT_NO = E.EVENT_NO) AS LIKE_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EVENT_LIKE EL WHERE EL.EVENT_NO = E.EVENT_NO AND EL.REGST_DATE BETWEEN (SYSDATE-4) AND SYSDATE) AS BEST_STD FROM EVENT E JOIN MARKET_MEMBER MM ON( E.MARKET_MEMBER_NO = MM.MARKET_MEMBER_NO) JOIN MARKET M ON( MM.MARKET_NO = M.MARKET_NO) JOIN DISCT D ON( M.DISCT_NO = D.DISCT_NO) WHERE DEL_FLAG = 0) ) E WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND DISCT_NO = #{disctNo}

SELECT EVENT_NO, MARKET_NAME, EVENT_NAME, REGST_DATE, START_DATE, END_DATE, HIT_NUM,LIKE_CNT, EVENT_NO_NEXT, EVENT_NO_BEFORE FROM (SELECT E.EVENT_NO, M.MARKET_NAME,E.EVENT_NAME,TO_CHAR(E.REGST_DATE,'YY-MM-DD') AS REGST_DATE, TO_CHAR(E.START_DATE,'YY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE,TO_CHAR(E.END_DATE,'YY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE, E.HIT_NUM,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EVENT_LIKE EL WHERE EL.EVENT_NO = E.EVENT_NO) AS LIKE_CNT, LAG(EVENT_NO,1,-1) OVER(ORDER BY EVENT_NO DESC ) AS EVENT_NO_NEXT, LEAD(EVENT_NO,1,-1) OVER(ORDER BY EVENT_NO DESC ) AS EVENT_NO_BEFORE FROM EVENT E JOIN MARKET_MEMBER MM ON( E.MARKET_MEMBER_NO = MM.MARKET_MEMBER_NO) JOIN MARKET M ON( MM.MARKET_NO = M.MARKET_NO) WHERE DEL_FLAG = 0) WHERE EVENT_NO = #{eventNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE EVENT SET HIT_NUM= HIT_NUM+1 WHERE EVENT_NO = #{eventNo}
